trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around July 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailsit was the 19th of july 2012 at 2:00am i got into bed opened my windows and my blind to let the air in. at 2:29pm i heard a loud noise souded like a airoplane was about to crash in to my house thats how loud it was it got louder as the object got closer i sat up on my bed and looked out my window to see what it was...at first i thought it was a airoplane but the realised it couldnt be it has no wings i saw a unknown object something i have never seen in my life it was a rocket sort of shape aircraft with white mirrored type exterior it had no windows had no wings so wasn't a airoplane it had a blue\green flame at the back like a jet plaine but not the same shape back as a jet plaine it zatted past my house and remarkable speeds in a straight direction it wasn't travelling upwards in the sky it was going horizontally and was travelling very low i jumped up put my head out of the window and the object had turned into a bright white light it was very large had no flashing lights like a red one that plain's have so i no it wasn't a plain the white light moved quickly then was gone completely dissapeared minutes after the event a airplane was in the sky then a helicopter???? i was stunned i couldnt believe what i saw you hear so much stuff on ufo's and the government try to hide it so you disbelieve like i did after thee morning's events i believe a ufo went past my home a considerably high speed people may think im mad but i know what i saw and if it wasnt travelling so fast i would have got a video recording
Summary: rocket shaped aircraft travelling at very high speed white mirrored type exterior rocket shape
